biography: Jin Hirao (平尾 仁, Hirao Jin, April 17, 1957) is a Japanese actor and voice actor from Tokyo. He is 173 cm tall and weighs 70 kg. Hitoshi Hirao (平尾 仁, Hirao Hitoshi) is his real name. He also was also active under the name of Jinshō Hirao (平尾 仁彰, Hirao Jinshō). Hirao is attached to Seinenza Theater Company since April 1, 1978.
name: Jin Hirao
